TextLibrary.Text: We know that your time is precious, but Lord Bane's minions captured a group of Iceguard on patrol. Is there any way you can seek them out and save them?

We know that your time is precious, but Lord Bane's minions captured a group of Iceguard on patrol. Is there any way you can seek them out and save them?
My people were also being taken into slavery by Lord Bane. He is using them to create this army of mindless ghouls and zombies.

Then you must bring them back to us before it is too late.
